page.title: 06Local organisations
page.content:
As there is no cinema or theatre within ten miles, the local villagers have to organise their own activities.
Children are able to join Girl Guides, Brownies, or the Boy Scouts or Cubs, though for these they have to travel between one and five miles to Pershore.
Within Pinvin and Peopleton the children tend to rely on the after school activities offered by teachers at Pinvin Middle school. These include soccer teams, rugby, basketball, netball, choir, dance and drama. The Pinvin Christmas pantomime is always very well attended, very professionally presented, and looked forward to by the local community.
